templates.title: WordPress Dev
templates.description: WordPress setup with a MySQL database
templates.note: Deploys a WordPress instance connected to a MySQL database.

env.name: DEV_WAN_HOSTNAME
env.label: Host Name
env.description: The FQDN to be used. No protocol, no trailing slash. ex: example.com

env.name: DEV_UID
env.label: Unique Identifier
env.description: A unique ID for this stack. Alphanumeric only. ex: example

env.name: DEV_XDEBUG_MODE
env.label: XDebug mode
env.description: Set the XDebug3 mode. Please consult XDebug documentation. ex: debug,profile

env.name: DEV_XDEBUG_IP
env.label: XDebug Remote IP
env.description: Set the XDebug3 remote connection IP. Usually the IP of your dev machine. Please consult XDebug documentation. ex: 192.168.1.111
